item.title: Adding a form with autocalculated fields in squarespace
item.description: I had to build a form on a squarespace hosted site that has to auto-calculate a couple of fields and also do field validation and offer the option to email the whole calculation to a visitor chosen address. I won’t publish the complete script here, but it should help get you going. First of all you will have to build this in the HTML/CSS block, you won’t be able to use the squarespace offered form builder.
